name: mipresion
description: MiPresión - Registro de presión sanguínea por Jonatandb

scripts.dev: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const version = require('child_process').execSync('node ./src/utils/readVersion.js').toString().trim(); execSync(`cross-env VITE_APP_VERSION=${version} vite`, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.build: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const version = require('child_process').execSync('node ./src/utils/readVersion.js').toString().trim(); execSync(`tsc && cross-env VITE_APP_VERSION=${version} VITE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED=true vite build`, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.build-dev: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const version = require('child_process').execSync('node ./src/utils/readVersion.js').toString().trim(); execSync(`tsc && cross-env VITE_APP_VERSION=${version} VITE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED=false vite build`, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
